enriched_profile.summary: Experienced Product Designer with 4-5 years of engineering experience and 1-2 years of working experience. Skilled in CAD, complex problem solving, stress analysis, and team leadership. Proven track record of developing innovative products and working in diverse team environments.

education.school: Columbia University in the City of New York

experience.description: Involved in prototype designing and 3D modeling for a portable, easily shipped, cost effective hardware that can send and receive digital content directly from satellites. Assisting drafters in developing the structural design of products using drafting tools or computer-assisted design (CAD) or drafting equipment and software.
Collaborated to create new innovative wearable pieces for a fashion show competition. Accessed a Makerspace and used a 3D printer with a $500 budget to create their wearable piece.

projects.name: Cable Management System for Electric Vehicle Charging Station
projects.description: Designed and fabricated a cable management system for a public-access electric vehicle charging station that dispenses and retracts 20 feet of cable for operation and provides secured storage for the cable when not in use.
